text: The Sultan-ul-Uloom Education Society is a non-profit organisation based in Hyderabad, India, which aimed at providing quality education to minority students. It runs several educational institutions in the city. == History == The society was established in 1980. == Institutions == * Muffakham Jah College of Engineering and Technology * Amjad Ali Khan College of Business Administration * Sultan-ul-Uloom College of Pharmacy * Sultan-ul-Uloom College of Law * Sultan-ul-Uloom Public School sultan ul uloom public school helps in enhancing more and more education for the students who have interest and hidden talent among them == References == Category:Non-profit organisations based in India
title: Sultan-ul-Uloom Education Society
